Yes I found this hidden secret based on yelp review and it lived up to the expectations. Being American I expected bigger portions but this is Spain so tapas and normal size portions. Paella was amazing! Cap ipota de pollo con was good too.Catch of the day with potatoes was heavenly.Order two rounds of paella! Order a bottle of house sinceStaff was really accommodating of our sleeping toddler - chef made special dish for her since she's allergic to fish and nuts Ambiance is tranquil...soft lighting..background music
